definition: Da Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

pinyin: Bu4 lu3 ke4 lin2 Da4 qiao2

definition: Donghai Bridge, 32.5 km bridge between Shanghai and the offshore Yangshan deep-water port
bay bridge (elevated bridge across stretch of water)
Tsing Ma Bridge (to Hong Kong Airport)

sentences.english: Lin Hai bridge is a cable-stayed bridge with a single pylon and one cable plane.
sentences.chinese: 臨海大橋是一座獨塔單索麪預應力混凝土抖拉橋。

sentences.english: It won't be long before the cross-river bridge is completed.
sentences.chinese: 不久之後新的跨江大橋就竣工了。

sentences.english: Picture the Bay Bridge in San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 想象一下舊金山的海灣大橋。

sentences.english: It's down Bridge Street on the right.
sentences.chinese: 它就在大橋街的路右邊。

sentences.english: I'm going to visit Nanpu Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 我將要去參觀南浦大橋。

sentences.english: In this paper, the excavation work of deep foundation pit for the north concrete anchor of south branch of Runyang Bridge is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了潤揚大橋南汊北錨碇深基坑工程開挖實例。

sentences.english: The cable support towers of Su-Tong Bridge are so far the highest cable support towers in the world.
sentences.chinese: 蘇通大橋索塔是目前已建成的世界最高索塔。

sentences.english: It's only 20 minutes from our company to Sutong Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 公司離蘇通大橋僅20分鐘車程。

sentences.english: Finally, according to chatter mechanism, analysis of occurrence of the Humen Bridge Flutter reasons .
sentences.chinese: 最後，從橋樑顫振機理分析虎門大橋發生顫振的原因。

sentences.english: And 5 different style of the bridge between the East and West will be closely linked together.
sentences.chinese: 而5座風格迥異的大橋又將東西兩岸緊緊連在一起。

sentences.english: Bridge Street is a good place to have fun.
sentences.chinese: 大橋街是個能愉悅享樂的好地方。

sentences.english: And the peoples liberation army this bridge maintenance task falls on the shoulders of the locks.
sentences.chinese: 而解放軍這面維護大橋的任務就落在了鎖頭的肩上。

sentences.english: Jinma Bridge is a major bridge in the expressway from Guangzhou to Zhaoqing.
sentences.chinese: 金馬大橋系廣州至肇慶高速公路上的一座特大橋樑。

sentences.english: The project is near the Donghai Bridge connecting Shanghai and the Yangshan port.
sentences.chinese: 該項目靠近連接上海和洋山港的東海大橋。

sentences.english: The Xuyi Huaihe River Bridge is a bridge combined with pipeline and road in Lu-Ning Oil Pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 魯寧管線上的盱眙淮河大橋是管橋結合的一座橋。
1932年的今天，悉尼海港大橋開通。

definition: to open to traffic (e.g. new bridge, rail line etc)/(of a locality) to have a transportation service/(Tw) to commute
light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
the whole front (in a war)/the whole length (of a road or railway line)
along the line (e.g. railway)/the region near the line
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
